name: Bina’s Home Away from Home Cozy Master Suite
neighborhood_overview: This is a quiet neighborhood. The place you want to be, away from home.
description:
STR-395992

If you are in Boston for a vacation, business or just a short layover, you’ve found the right place, Bina’s home away from home.

This is a Cozy Master bedroom with it’s own private bathroom.
This room is on the upper Level. With a mini refrigerator.
55 inch Smart TV
We have all the basic shower amenities
Bath towel, wash cloth, body wash, lotion, shampoo & conditioner.

The space
Kitchen & Dinning room

Bathroom

Guest access
Back Porch
Back Yard after 5:30pm can use in The Summer
Weekends open all day.

Other things to note
If this room is not available for the dates you want. Check out our other listings for rooms in that apartment.
